Description: Glass pendant with suspension loop; turquoise; obverse: a menorah (seven-branched candlestick); in left field, an ethrog, in right field, a lulav.
Bibliographic references: Entwistle & Finney 2013 / Late Antique Glass Pendants in the British Museum (87)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (10)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015, Oct 29 – 2016, Feb 7. British Museum, Room 35. Egypt: Faith after the Pharoahs 2015 1 April - 15 Sept. Berlin, Bode Museum, 'EIN GOTT - Abrahams Erben am Nil'
